common_rejection_reasons: - PR #1098: Closing — bundling React 19, Vite 7, ESLint 10, and multiple other major version bumps in a single PR is too risky. The Netlify build is also failing. These should be done as separate, incremental PRs so breakage can be isolated. Thank you for the effort!
- PR #1081: Closing — @netlify/blobs is actively used by `netlify/functions/presence.mts` for tracking simultaneous active users (consumed by `useActiveUsers.ts`). Not unused.
- PR #1064: Closing — ARIA labels on an internal Kubernetes dashboard used by platform engineers aren't a priority right now.

- PR #1061: Closing — the keyboard navigation hooks are well-designed but the FloatingDashboardActions refactor loses tooltip title attributes on all buttons, introducing a regression. The risk outweighs the benefit for this codebase.
- PR #1060: Closing — the delete confirmations add friction and the AI chat toast is noisy. Not needed at this time.

pr_guidance: Keep changes under 50 lines (size S) for best acceptance rate. Split larger fixes into multiple PRs.
